summary: RaceMenu preset for my character Xari
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#6d9eeb][size=6][b]-Requirements-[/b][/size]
[size=3]
[/size][b][size=3]-RaceMenu-
-True Eyes- 
-KS hairdos (Google It!)-
-Brows-[/size][/b][/color]

[b][size=6]
[color=#c27ba0]-Installation-[/color][/size][/b]
[size=3]
Once you have downloaded the file, open and extract the Xari.slot to a convenient location e.g. desktop.

Then locate your preset folder. (If these folder do not exist, just make them)

[b][color=#c27ba0]MODORGANIZER - (ModOrganizer\overwrite\skse\plugins\CharGen\Presets)
SKYRIM DIRECTORY - (Data\SKSE\Plugins\CharGen\Presets)[/color][/b]

After that rename the Xari.slot to a number from 1 - 50 and then simply drag and drop into the folder (Example [b]10.slot[/b])[/size]
[size=3]

[/size][color=#f6b26b][size=6][b]-Recommendations-[/b][/size]

[b][size=3]-Pretty Lips-
-Imperial Race-
-Women Of Skyrim-
-High Res Warpaint-
-Better Makeup for SKSE-
-Familiar Faces (so you can make her a follower)-[/size][/b][/color]


[size=3]Xari is an Imperial, so for the best result I recommend an Imperial Character, just my opinion though. 

Feel free to change her appearance to how you want her to look, otherwise enjoy.


[color=#f6b26b]Credit to expired6978 for the RaceMenu Mod so that this could be possible :).
Credit to Shocky's character; Arielle, for the inspiration. :)  

(Sorry I didn't put this in earlier, completely forgot to do it)[/color][/size][/center]
author: Undeadgoblin
